1.name: Zero to Hero
1.objective: Survive a raid starting only with your knife.

2.name: Friday the 13th
2.objective: Eliminate at least 1 PMC with a Jason Mask and your knife.

3.name: Zero to Hero - Hardcore
3.objective: Survive a raid starting with absolutely nothing.

4.name: Escape from Tarkov
4.objective: Survive a full marathon playthrough starting from Ground Zero and extracting on Shoreline.

5.name: Escape from Tarkov - Hardcore
5.objective: Survive a full marathon playthrough starting from Ground Zero and extracting on Shoreline.  Knife only start.

6.name: Definitely Not a Scav
6.objective: Disguise yourself as a scav, infiltrate, and eliminate 3 other scavs in a single raid.

7.name: The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly
7.objective: Eliminate 3 PMCs using only revolver type weapons in a single raid.

8.name: One in the Chamber
8.objective: Eliminate 3 PMCs using only the MP18 OR any rifle WITHOUT magazines in a single raid.

9.name: Power of the Sun
9.objective: Eliminate 3 PMCs using an AR or a shotgun with the maximum amount of flashlight attachments in a single raid.

10.name: Heavy Metal
10.objective: Eliminate 3 PMCs using a Machine Gun while wearing the Zabrallo and an Altyn.

11.name: Lending a Hand
11.objective: Stash your kit (valued at least 300k roubles) in any large technical crate and extract.

12.name: Kill 'em All
12.objective: Eliminate 3 PMCs while using Killa's loadout - helmet, armor, and the RPK - in a single raid.

13.name: Gold Plated
13.objective: Eliminate 3 PMCs using the gold plated PM pistol in a single raid.

14.name: Desert Eagle POINT FIVE OH
14.objective: Eliminate 3 PMCs using the Desert Eagle in a single raid.

15.name: Rolling Thunder
15.objective: Bring in and use at least 20+ grenades.

16.name: The One
16.objective: Fill your tatical rig with Pistols/SMGs to use while in raid.  Eliminate 4 PMCs, no reloading, in a single raid.

17.name: Rat Catcher
17.objective: Eliminate any targets in the D2 extraction on Reserve.

18.name: Partisan Protege
18.objective: Survive a raid while wearing a beard, beanie, and Partizan's backpack.  Eliminate 1 PMC with tripwire grenades.

19.name: Weapon Handling
19.objective: Eliminate 3 PMCs with any Assualt Rifle WITHOUT modifications in a single raid.

20.name: Controlled Distruction
20.objective: Eliminate 3 PMC with the M32A1 Grenade Launcher in a single raid.

21.name: Over Exposure
21.objective: Elimate 3 PMCs that have been blinded by the KS-23 flash rounds in a single raid.

22.name: Last Resort
22.objective: Eliminate 3 PMCs with the TOZ shotgun in a single raid.

23.name: Designated Smoking Area
23.objective: Eliminate 1 PMC while concealed by smoke in the Dorms area of Customs.

24.name: Danger Close
24.objective: Eliminate at least 3 PMCs while using either a Shotgun or SMG in a single raid.  No armor allowed.

25.name: Lumberjack
25.objective: Eliminate 3 PMCs using the Glock 18 with RIP rounds, in a single raid.

27.name: Fight Against the Darkness
27.objective: Survive a nighttime raid with your flashlight on at all times.  No NVGs.

28.name: Fence Partnership
28.objective: Eliminate 3 PMCs using a loudout purchased from Fence, including ammo, in a single raid.

29.name: Laboratory Lockdown
29.objective: Eliminate 5 PMCs and 10 Raiders on Labs in a single raid.

30.name: Are You Not Entertained?
30.objective: Eliminate Tagilla with your knife.  You cannot damage him by any other means.
